backend/main.mo: Motoko actor with access‑controlled user profiles, crypto symbol mapping, and CoinGecko HTTP outcall endpoints including admin‑only debug mode.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling identity bootstrapping, routing between dashboard and backend tester, and conditional profile setup.
Dialog showing disabled crypto‑add feature with a notice that backend support is not implemented.
frontend/src/components/BackendTesterEnt: Entry button for the backend tester with admin checks, loading/error states, and limited‑mode navigation.
frontend/src/components/ConfigErrorBound: Empty placeholder file for a configuration error boundary.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionBootst: Wrapper managing actor initialization, timeouts, retry flows, and identity re‑authentication before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionDetail: Expandable card showing authentication, actor, admin, and diagnostic connection states with a clipboard copy feature.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionRecove: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/CryptoCard.tsx: Displays a crypto card with mock price data, market info, and opens a detail dialog for deeper analysis.
frontend/src/components/CryptoDetailDial: Dialog showing tabs for forecast charts and settings, maintaining per-session forecast parameters.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution and a disclaimer about cryptocurrency risks.
frontend/src/components/ForecastChart.ts: Generates mock historical data, computes regression and moving averages, and renders a forecast chart with future predictions.
frontend/src/components/ForecastSettings: Panel providing sliders to adjust moving average period and forecast horizon for crypto analysis.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with theme toggle, authentication handling, user registration, branding, and optional backend tester navigation.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: A login landing page component displaying app features and triggering Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/PriceEntryManage: Empty file with no implemented logic or UI.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal prompting the user to enter a name and save their profile via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedBashPan: A simulated terminal panel that runs backend commands, handles reconnection logic, and displays command output.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistManager: Displays a watchlist management card showing demo-mode alerts and a button to add cryptocurrencies.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistPriceTi: A card UI for live watchlist price ticks, currently showing a demo-mode alert.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorEnhanced.ts: Wraps useActor with diagnostics, timeout handling, and retry logic for backend/admin initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectionRecovery: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity loading, and session handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, roles, and placeholder crypto queries with unimplemented backend stubs.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes, including color system and layout tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/BackendTesterPage.tsx: Renders an admin diagnostic and testing interface showing permission status, identity info, and backend diagnostics.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays the main dashboard with watchlist tools, popular crypto cards, and optional navigation to the backend tester.
frontend/src/utils/backendTesterCommands: Defines a list of demo backend command configurations, including metadata, execution stubs, and output parsers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color palette, extended theming, and animation/keyframe utilities with several plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the project’s backend–frontend setup, known issues, and pending feature requests for Motoko debug endpoints and live market data fetching.
